skins.shipDescription: Second ship of the Ise-class battleships, Hyuuga.
skins.selfIntroduction: Hyuuga, second ship of the Ise-class, reporting in. Like my sister, I don't have many actual achievements. Then again, the same goes for most of us Sakura Empire battleships. That includes Na-whatever and Ya-whatever. It has nothing to do with our designs or capabilities! ...Hmph. Make fun of me all you want, Commander, but I'll show you what I'm made of.
skins.acquisition: I'm the little sister of my stupid big sister... Ah! That doesn't mean that I'm a stupid little sister, alright?! Anyways, I'm Hyuuga. Nice to meet you.
skins.login: Phew... Wouldn't you agree that it's better to train from dusk until dawn instead of from dawn to dusk?
skins.details: Want to practice combat techniques with me, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ise, please clean your room every now and then...
skins.secretaryIdle2: It sure would be nice to meet Hatsushimo here.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Though the Age of Aviation has come, it still isn't the Age of Aviation Battleships.
skins.secretaryTouch: A veteran swordsman should be able to detect her opponent's energy before they get too close... I still have a long way to go...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, let's spar. If you win, I'll let you touch me as much as you'd like.

skins.shipDescription: Aviation battleship Hyuuga, sporting new powers, reporting in! Rest easy, Commander, I'll show you my true post-retrofit power!
skins.acquisition: Aviation battleship Hyuuga, sporting new powers, reporting in! Rest easy, Commander, I'll show you my true post-retrofit power!
skins.login: Hey, please help me out with my training today!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Though battleships have seen better times, I will not give up!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ise's still behaving like she always has... *Sigh*...
skins.secretaryIdle3: It takes a lot of skill to use planes right... I oughta ask for tips from someone with experience.
skins.secretaryTouch: *Gasp*...! I couldn't sense your presence until you touched me.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Prepared to pay for what you just did? You don't stand the shadow of a chance against me.
